hint: Apply conservative filters early to dimension tables, push predicates into subqueries, and use CTEs for clear materialization without risky restructuring.
Isolate filtered date ranges and dimension tables into separate CTEs before joining to fact tables, enabling better predicate pushdown and join reordering.
Pre-filter and pre-join dimensions with fact data in staged CTEs, then consolidate aggregation and window operations to minimize intermediate result sizes.
Experiment with structural transformations: defer window ranking, convert potential OR conditions to UNION ALL, and apply decorrelation patterns even if not directly present.
